metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: Occupant load from Table 3.1.17.1 unless fewer persons can be shown
requirements.exact_quote: the occupant load of a floor area or part of a floor area shall be the number of persons for which such areas are designed, but not fewer than that determined from Table 3.1.17.1

requirements.description: Occupant load for dwelling units
requirements.exact_value: 2 persons per bedroom or sleeping area
requirements.exact_quote: The occupant load for dwelling units shall be based on 2 persons per bedroom or sleeping area

requirements.description: Minimum width of exit facilities (except doors and corridors)
requirements.exact_quote: the width of every exit facility shall be not less than 900 mm

requirements.description: Minimum width of public corridors and exit corridors
requirements.exact_quote: The width of every public corridor, corridor used by the public, and exit corridor shall be not less than 1100 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clear height in exits and access to exits
requirements.exact_quote: the minimum clear height in exits and access to exits shall be 2.1 m

requirements.description: Minimum clear height in storage garages
requirements.exact_quote: The clear height in exits and access to exits in storage garages shall be not less than 2 m

requirements.description: Fire separation for exits where no floor assembly above
requirements.exact_quote: a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than the greater of i) that required by Subsection 9.10.8. for the floor assembly below, or ii) 45 min

articles.title: Stairways in 2 Storey, Group D or E Buildings

requirements.description: Maximum suite area per storey for non-exit stairways
requirements.condition: 2-storey D or E occupancy, building <= 2 storeys
requirements.exact_quote: the area occupied by the suite is not greater than 100 m2 per storey

requirements.description: Maximum travel distance for non-exit stairways
requirements.exact_quote: the maximum travel distance from any point in the suite to an exterior exit is not greater than 25 m

articles.title: Obstructions in Public Corridors
articles.subsection: 9.9.5 Obstructions and Hazards in Means of Egress

requirements.description: Maximum projection of obstructions into corridors
requirements.exact_quote: obstructions located within 1980 mm of the floor shall not project horizontally more than 100 mm into exit passageways, corridors used by the public or public corridors

articles.title: Obstructions in Means of Egress
articles.subsection: 9.9.5 Obstructions and Hazards in Means of Egress

requirements.description: Minimum width of restricted egress
requirements.exact_quote: No obstructions such as posts or turnstiles shall be placed so as to restrict the width of a required means of egress from a floor area or part of a floor area to less than 750 mm unless an alternate unobstructed means of egress is provided

articles.title: Clear Opening Height at Doorways
articles.subsection: 9.9.6 Doors in a Means of Egress

requirements.description: Clear opening height of exit doorways
requirements.exact_quote: the clear opening height of doorways shall be not less than 2030 mm high

requirements.description: Clear opening height under door closers
requirements.exact_quote: The clear opening height under door closers and other devices in doorways described in Sentence (1) shall be not less than 1980 mm

articles.title: Clear Opening Width at Doorways
articles.subsection: 9.9.6 Doors in a Means of Egress

requirements.description: Minimum width of single-leaf exit door
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 800 mm wide where there is only one door leaf

requirements.description: Minimum width with multiple leaves, one active
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 800 mm wide where multiple-leaf doors are installed with only one active leaf having a latching mechanism

requirements.description: Minimum width with multiple leaves, two active
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 1210 mm wide where multiple-leaf doors are installed with two active leaves

requirements.description: Minimum width of single active leaf
requirements.exact_quote: no active leaf shall be less than 810 mm wide where only one leaf is active

requirements.description: Minimum width of each leaf when two active
requirements.exact_quote: no single leaf shall be less than 610 mm wide where two leaves are active

articles.title: Nearness of Doors to Stairs
articles.subsection: 9.9.6 Doors in a Means of Egress

requirements.description: Minimum distance from stair riser to door edge during swing
requirements.exact_quote: the distance between a stair riser and the leading edge of a door during its swing, except for doors serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, shall be not less than 300 mm

requirements.description: Maximum step height at exit door (ice/snow conditions)
requirements.condition: danger of blockage from ice or snow
requirements.exact_quote: an exit door, including doors serving a single dwelling unit, may open onto not more than one step, provided the riser of such a step does not exceed 150 mm

articles.title: Door Latching, Locking and Opening Mechanisms
articles.subsection: 9.9.6 Doors in a Means of Egress

requirements.description: Height of door release hardware
requirements.exact_quote: Door release hardware on doors in a means of egress shall be installed 900 mm to 1100 mm above the finished floor

articles.title: Effort Required to Open
articles.subsection: 9.9.6 Doors in a Means of Egress

requirements.description: Maximum force to open exit door
requirements.exact_quote: when the latch is released the door will open in the direction of exit travel under a force of not more than 90 N applied to the door release hardware

requirements.description: Maximum length of dead-end corridor
requirements.exact_quote: a dead-end corridor is permitted provided it is not more than 6 m long

articles.title: Number and Spacing of Egress Doors
articles.full_text: Except for dwelling units, at least 2 egress doors shall be provided when the area of a room or suite, or the distance measured from any point within the room or suite to the nearest egress door, exceeds the values in Table 9.9.7.4.

requirements.description: Maximum area for single egress - Group C (except dwelling units)
requirements.exact_quote: Group C (except dwelling units) - Max Area 100 m2, Max Distance 15 m

requirements.description: Maximum area for single egress - Group D
requirements.exact_quote: Group D - Max Area 200 m2, Max Distance 25 m

requirements.description: Maximum area for single egress - Group E
requirements.exact_quote: Group E - Max Area 150 m2, Max Distance 15 m

requirements.description: Maximum area for single egress - Group F, Division 2
requirements.exact_quote: Group F Division 2 - Max Area 150 m2, Max Distance 10 m

requirements.description: Maximum area for single egress - Group F, Division 3
requirements.exact_quote: Group F Division 3 - Max Area 200 m2, Max Distance 15 m

requirements.description: Maximum travel distance - business and personal services
requirements.exact_quote: 40 m in the case of business and personal services occupancies

requirements.description: Maximum travel distance - sprinklered floor areas
requirements.exact_quote: 45 m for all occupancies where the floor area is sprinklered

requirements.description: Maximum travel distance - all other occupancies
requirements.exact_quote: 30 m for all other occupancies

requirements.description: Maximum occupant load for single exit
requirements.exact_quote: a single exit is permitted from each storey in buildings of 1 and 2 storeys in building height provided the floor area and travel distance requirements conform... and the total occupant load served by an exit facility does not exceed 60 persons

requirements.description: Maximum lobby height above grade
requirements.exact_quote: The lobby referred to in Sentence (1) shall be not more than 4.5 m above grade

requirements.description: Maximum travel distance through lobby
requirements.exact_quote: the path of travel through the lobby to the outdoors shall not exceed 15 m

articles.title: Travel Limit to Exits or Egress Doors

requirements.description: Maximum height of exit doorway above ground
requirements.exact_quote: an exit doorway not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level

requirements.description: Minimum egress window dimensions
requirements.exact_quote: an openable window providing an unobstructed opening of not less than 1 m in height and 0.55 m in width

requirements.description: Maximum egress window sill height above floor
requirements.exact_quote: located so that the sill is not more than 1 m above the floor

requirements.description: Maximum egress window sill height above ground
requirements.exact_quote: located so that the sill is not more than 7 m above adjacent ground level

articles.title: Egress Windows or Doors for Bedrooms

requirements.description: Minimum bedroom egress window area
requirements.exact_quote: The window referred to in Sentence (1) shall provide an unobstructed opening of not less than 0.35 m2 in area with no dimension less than 380 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clearance in front of window in window well
requirements.exact_quote: Where a window required in Sentence (1) opens into a window well, a clearance of not less than 760 mm shall be provided in front of the window

requirements.description: Minimum height of floor number numerals
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 60 mm high, raised approximately 0.8 mm above the surface

requirements.description: Location of floor number
requirements.exact_quote: located 1500 mm from the finished floor and not more than 300 mm from the door

requirements.description: Average illumination level in egress
requirements.exact_quote: Every exit, public corridor or corridor providing access to exit for the public shall be equipped to provide illumination to an average level of not less than 50 lx at floor or tread level

requirements.description: Minimum illumination level in egress
requirements.exact_quote: The minimum value of the illumination required by Sentence (1) shall be not less than 10 lx

requirements.description: Minimum duration of emergency lighting
requirements.exact_quote: Lighting required in Sentence (1) shall be designed to be automatically actuated for a period of at least 30 min when the electric lighting in the affected area is interrupted

requirements.description: Average illumination from emergency lighting
requirements.exact_quote: Illumination from lighting required in Sentence (1) shall be provided to average levels of not less than 10 lx at floor or tread level

requirements.description: Minimum illumination from emergency lighting
requirements.exact_quote: The minimum value of the illumination required by Sentence (4) shall be not less than 1 lx

key_dimensions.emergency_lighting: 30 min duration, 10 lx average, 1 lx min
